wikipedia_page.main:
Paul McKay (born 19 November 1996) is a Scottish professional footballer who plays as either a defender or midfielder for Queen of the South. McKay has previously played for Doncaster Rovers, Leeds United, Cardiff City and Airdrieonians. McKay has also had loan spells with Ilkeston, Gainsborough Trinity and 
Morecambe.
McKay was born in Glasgow and played youth football with the Doncaster Rovers Academy as well as studying  at Hill House School, before starting his professional career with the club.

response: Willie McKay is a British football agent, based in Monaco. He was the agent of many top-level footballers, mainly based in England and France, specifically the Premier League His clients include James McFadden, Joey Barton, Henri Camara, Scott McDonald, Jean-Joël Perrier-Doumbé, Charles N'Zogbia, Tyrone Mears, Amdy Faye, Ross McCormack, and Pascal Chimbonda. He was Scott Brown's agent and his twin sons agent, Jack and Paul McKay. His elder son Mark McKay is a registered football agent.
McKay's father Willie McKay and his older brother Mark are both football agents. His twin brother, Paul McKay is also a professional footballer. He studied at Hill House School.
